title: Introduction
desc: This is a cultivation world where many cultivators compete to ascend.

title: Realm
desc: Cultivation realms from weak to strong: Qi Refinement, Foundation Establishment, Core Formation, Nascent Soul. Each realm is divided into Early, Middle, and Late stages. The gap between realms is immense.

title: Lifespan
desc: Every character has a lifespan. Exceeding it leads to death by old age. Advancing realms and certain treasures or elixirs can increase lifespan.

title: Death
desc: You will also die if HP drops below 0.

title: Region
desc: Different regions have different effects. Doing the right thing in the right region yields double the results with half the effort.

title: Cultivate
desc: Cultivation increases experience until reaching a bottleneck. Breakthrough is probabilistic; success leads to the next realm.

title: Spiritual Root
desc: Determines your affinity with spiritual Qi. Cultivating in a region matching your root (e.g.
column3: Fire Root in a Fire Abode) is most efficient.

title: Celestial Phenomenon
desc: The world undergoes celestial changes (like Qi Tides) every few years

title: Spirit Stones
desc: The currency of the cultivation world. Used to buy artifacts and elixirs; obtained through harvesting

title: Sect
desc: A sanctuary for cultivators. Joining a sect grants unique techniques and protection; rogue cultivators are free but lack resources.

title: Combat
desc: Survival of the fittest. Realm suppression is massive; higher realms have absolute advantage. Winners can plunder the loser's belongings upon death.

title: Action
desc: You have a series of actionable commands. Pay attention to effects

title: Equipment & Elixir
column4: and elixirs provide stat bonuses. Owning good gear or taking high-quality elixirs brings great benefits.

title: Shopping
desc: You can buy Qi Refinement level elixirs and weapons in City regions. Elixirs are consumed immediately for buffs. Buying weapons switches your weapon type.

title: Auction
desc: Mysterious auctions occur at uncertain intervals
